info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 2:22PM MDT until March 18 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Eddy County in southeastern New Mexico... Lea County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 315 PM MDT.
* At 219 PM MDT, a dust channel was 12 miles southeast of Artesia, moving east at 60 mph.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reports numerous accidents on US Highway 285 and US Highway 82 beteen Carlsbad, Artesia, and Hobbs.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
Avoid travel on US Highway 285, US Highway 82, US Highway 62, and US Highway 380 in Eddy and Lea Counties.
Locations impacted include... Monument, Loco Hills, Humble City, Hobbs, Artesia, Avalon, Otis, Maljamar, Crossroads, Loving, Seven Rivers Airport, Gladiola, Dayton, Tatum Airport, McDonald, Brantley Lake State Park, Tatum, Halfway, Lea County Regional Airport, and Atoka.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 3:15 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 3:15 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:15 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 3:15 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
